mapper.insert: insert into depart_application(apply_user_id, reason, time, student_id) VALUE (#{applyUserId}, #{reason}, now(), #{studentId})
mapper.select: select da.id as id, apply_user_id, reason, da.time as time, da.student_id as student_id, su.id as u_id, su.real_name as u_name, s.id as s_id, s.name as s_name from depart_application da left join student s on da.student_id = s.id left join system_user su on da.apply_user_id = su.id where da.apply_user_id = #{userId} order by da.time desc

select dau.id as dau_id, dau.is_agree as is_agree, dau.operate_time as operate_time, dau.reason as dau_reason, da.id as id, da.reason as reason, da.time as time, s.id as s_id, s.name as s_name, su.id as u_id, su.real_name as u_name from depart_application_user dau left join depart_application da on dau.application_id = da.id left join student s on s.id = da.student_id left join system_user su on da.apply_user_id = su.id where dau.operate_user_id = #{userId} order by da.time desc

select dau.id as id, dau.is_agree as is_agree, dau.operate_time as operate_time, dau.reason as reason, su.id as u_id, su.real_name as u_name from depart_application_user dau left join system_user su on dau.operate_user_id = su.id where application_id = #{id} order by dau.id desc

select da.id as id, apply_user_id, reason, da.time as time, da.student_id as student_id, su.id as u_id, su.real_name as u_name, s.id as s_id, s.name as s_name from depart_application da left join student s on da.student_id = s.id left join system_user su on da.apply_user_id = su.id where da.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update depart_application_user set is_agree = #{isAgree}, reason = #{reason}, operate_time = now() where id = #{id}
